thread.title: Webster native is back home sculpting hair | Local | the-messenger.com
thread.title_full: Webster native is back home sculpting hair | Local | the-messenger.com

author: David R. Drennan For The Journal-Enterprise
title: Webster native is back home sculpting hair | Local | the-messenger.com
text:
A familiar face is back in Webster County, and is all about the fresh cuts and newest styles. Chris Gardner is a stylist with Webster County ties and experiences and has recently returned to Clay’s Sculpt Salon on First Street. He’s looking forward to giving customers a “great new look” and building his business here again.
Webster native is back home sculpting hair
